mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.member_id AS "memberId", a.true_name AS "trueName", a.process_instance_id AS "processInstanceId", a.process_state AS "processState", a.price_all AS "priceAll", a.cost_all AS "costAll", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.city_id AS "city.id", a.province_id AS "province.id", a.address AS "address", a.orders_state AS "ordersState", a.goods_state AS "goodsState", a.pay_state AS "payState", a.flag AS "flag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.refund AS "refund", a.income AS "income"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a8 ON a8.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders( id, member_id, true_name, process_instance_id, process_state, price_all, cost_all, area_id, city_id, province_id, address, orders_state, goods_state, pay_state, flag, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, refund, income ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{trueName}, #{processInstanceId}, #{processState}, #{priceAll}, #{costAll}, #{area.id}, #{city.id}, #{province.id}, #{address}, #{ordersState}, #{goodsState}, #{payState}, #{flag}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{refund}, #{income} )
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET true_name = #{trueName}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId}, process_state = #{processState}, price_all = #{priceAll}, cost_all = #{costAll}, area_id = #{area.id}, city_id = #{city.id}, province_id = #{province.id}, address = #{address}, orders_state = #{ordersState}, goods_state = #{goodsState}, pay_state = #{payState}, flag = #{flag}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, refund = #{refund}, income = #{income} WHERE id = #{id}
